CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( ISBLANK(Credited_BDR_lookup__c), ISBLANK(Credited_SDR__c), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Expansion"), CONTAINS(CreatedBy.Profile.Name,"Sales")), "Current Customer",
IF( AND( ISBLANK(Credited_BDR_lookup__c), ISBLANK(Credited_SDR__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Expansion")), CONTAINS(CreatedBy.Profile.Name,"Sales")), "AE Outbound",
IF( AND( ISBLANK(Credited_BDR_lookup__c), ISBLANK(Credited_SDR__c), NOT(CONTAINS(CreatedBy.Profile.Name,"Sales"))), "Inbound",
IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Credited_BDR_lookup__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Credited_SDR__c))), "Inbound,Outbound",
IF(ISBLANK( Credited_SDR__c ),"Outbound", IF(ISBLANK( Credited_BDR_lookup__c ),"Inbound",
NULL
))))))
CustomField.label: Lead Category - deprecated
